summary: Sisters Alex and Madison are whisked away to the Bahamas for winter break but soon find themselves crossing paths with a man smuggling stolen artifacts.
cast: Mary-Kate Olsen|Ashley Olsen|Austin Nichols|Ben Easter|Ashley Hughes|Markus Flanagan|Jamie Rose|Jeff Altman|Wendy Schaal|Billy Aaron Brown|Megan Fox|Ashley Kelly|Sterling Rice|Phillip Sands|C.J. title: Aventura en las Bahamas
